channel.title: attack.t1137 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.t1137 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: IE Change Domain Zone
item.description: Hides the file extension through modification of the registry

item.title: Registry Modification to Hidden File Extension
item.description: Hides the file extension through modification of the registry

item.title: Change Outlook Security Setting in Registry
Outlook C2 Registry Key
item.description: Detects the modification of Outlook Security Setting to allow unprompted execution. Goes with win_outlook_c2_macro_creation.yml and is particularly interesting if both events occur near to each other.

item.title: Outlook C2 Macro Creation
item.description: Detects the creation of a macro file for Outlook. Goes with win_outlook_c2_registry_key. VbaProject.OTM is explicitly mentioned in T1137. Particularly interesting if both events Registry & File Creation happens at the same time.
